captions.text:
ÒTitle In The MiddleÓ,
everybody plays.

How does it work? We'll
do a couple of scenes,

every one of them will begin
with Daniel Tauszig's sounds,

someone will have an idea
and will start a scene,

then I will pause the scene.
I will get a sentence,

from the box of suggestions, and
that will be the title of the scene.

Then they'll have to figure
out what to do with the scene.
Dani Tauszig, bring it on!
There's a dog, a dog!
Get it, get it!

- I'm afraid of dogs!
- You don't know nothing, let me do it!

- What now?
- Help me up here!

Are you sure this is the
best way to steal the TV?

The title is ÔWhen I was a kid,
I was afraid of clownsÕ.

- ÔWallÕ.
- Fuckin' high wall...

- Motherfucker...
- Jump, c'mon!

- Shit...
- Go...

- What breed is it?
- Come here and see it!
Wait a minute, I'm coming!

- Look!
- Wow!

It's a poodle,
I'm not afraid of poodles.

- That is not a dog!
- I'm not afraid of chihuahuas!
Are you sure this is a real breed?
It's a clown dog, I'm scared!
One more, Dani.

I'm so glad you came,
Super Anteater!

Those naughty ants
have stolen my juice!
Have no fear, Anteater is here!

The title is
ÔI used to be good at thisÕ.
Oh, my God...
Blood, blood, blood...

Super Anteater,
why didn't you beat them?
He used to be good at this!
Dani Tauszig.

Hi!
Welcome to Rio de Janeiro.
At this first time, we got...

There's a beautiful lady here, and now,
if you're going to see the World Cup here,
it's gonna be a pleasant time
This is Brazil!

The title is
'I want a holy hostÕ.
Look, it's the pope!

I wanna...
I wanna...
In english, let me hear it!
I want a holy cream cracker!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

- Starting now...
- You will also see...
Cute!
